It's a rare opportunity to all of us. Make use of it!!!FRANCHISEE ELIGIBILITYBoth full time and the part timer can apply for a franchise.The direct approach needs to be made to the regional office to apply for cash back franchise.Every transaction of franchise’s member circle needs to be made transparent to the franchise.The available contact details need to be shared with the customers for any clarifications.A separate franchise card would be provided.Promotional activities would include a billboard, pamphlet distribution and Facebook promotion.Any complaints or tampering caused by the franchise owner would lead to immediate rustication.
